item.title: Github - How to Push Files to a Repository in Terminal
item.description: I’m fairly new to this, so there will be some uncertainties at the moment, but it pretty much includes all I did for mine to work. I’ll come back to this. Github Access Token First of all you need a token which you can find in your Github settings under Settings > Developer settings > Personal access tokens > Tokens (Classic). Click Generate new token > (Classic). Give it the name and permissions you want it to have, it can also have everything.
